actionPlanInstructions.description: Recommended actions to carry out if the control isn't fulfilled.

actionPlanTitle.description: Title of the action plan for remediating the control.

arn.description:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the control.
* `control_mapping_sources.*.source_id` - Unique identifier for the source.

controlMappingSources.description:
Data mapping sources. See `control_mapping_sources` below.

The following arguments are optional:

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the control. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

testingInformation.description: Steps to follow to determine if the control is satisfied.

type.description: Type of control, such as a custom control or a standard control.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Control resources.
